tool_description: An API showing all the Northgard clans
name: Northgard
title: Northgard

api_list.name: Get By Name
api_list.description: This endpoint will return an especific clan from northgard. You need to provide a name
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://northgard.p.rapidapi.com/clans/raven clan"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "northgard.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://northgard.p.rapidapi.com/clans/{name}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "northgard.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Clans
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all clans from Northgard
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://northgard.p.rapidapi.com/clans"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "northgard.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
